item.title: Traffic light sequence at Kingsditch roundabout on Tewkesbury road has changed, 5th December
item.description:
The sequence has changed and as a consequence the traffic is building up on the roundabout itself and blocking the exits for vehicles when the lights turn to green on approaching roads. A lot more delays than there have been over the last few weeks- (this has been like this for a number of weeks).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Traffic light head is facing wrong direction

item.title: Traffic Light sequence causing long tail backs of traffic coming from Gloucester, 5th December
item.description:
The traffic lights do not stay on green long enough for traffic coming from Gloucester. This is causing excessivly long traffic que back towards Gloucester 3.30pm and 5.30pm. Traffic unable to get onto the B4063 at other traffic light controlled junctions closer to Gloucester.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: I was cycling down kayte lane on 03/12/2025 at 5.40pm, the lane has no street lighting and the on coming car headlights dazzled my view of the road and i went into this pot hole. This pot hole is very deep and large and difficult to swerve around it. I've badly injured my leg and head. This pot hole is very dangerous for cyclists who use this road frequently., 5th December
item.description:
Located outside 4 kayte cottages, kayte lane, gl52 3pd.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two large potholes on Willersey Road, near #17, 5th December
item.description:
One pothole is on the road in front of the driveway to #17 Willersey Rd, the other is on the road near to a small crabapple tree on the pavement in between #15 and #17 Willersey Rd. They have been developing for a while but got significantly worse in the last few weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Willersey Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road needs sweeping of huge amount of fallen leaves, 5th December
item.description:
Huge amount of fallen leaves on right side of road as you drive down Churchill Drive past Churchill Gardens to Haywards Road. In danger of clogging up drains at bottom of road, causing an overflow of rain water. Will need to give at least 24 hour notice to move all parked cars so road is clear to enable road to be swept completely.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Churchill Drive, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
The manhole on the pavement has completely collapsed, dangerous for school children
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
